column7: Good burger, quick and friendly service in Lundssaluhall
column9: Friendly service in a little restaurant inside the market hall of Lund. Burger was terrific and cost was reasonable for a quick lunch.

We stumbled upon this gem when passing by and we were pleasantly surprised. The quality of the food wa s surprisingly good and the staff were very friendly and helpful.

I had the lamb stew and my wife chose a shish kebab with chicken. Afterwards...More

We had to make a change from our normal routine of eating fish at Malmstens and were quite at a loss where to eat. This place was right opposite, had free tables and looked OK. I ordered the angus hamburger, my friend the lamb stew....More

The Shiraz is located inside the Saluhallen, a convenient mix of restaurants and delis. I just wanted a tasty and fast meal, and I got both. Be aware that there are some peculiarities: you have to order your food when you arrive (before seating), and...More

Might not necessarily be very authentic Iranian, which it is apparently supposed to be, but the food is nonetheless delicious and appetizing.
Prices maybe slightly on the higher end as it is located inside the Saluhall, at the centre of town.
A very nice place, owner is Persian and there's always a Persian dish to choose, alays delicious. It's a small place, so it might be wise to book a table beforehand.
